dcterms:creator: Y. Dai
C. Li
S. Zhou
R. Feng
C. C. Loy
dcterms:description: Flare7K++ is a comprehensive nighttime flare removal dataset, consisting of 962 real-captured flare images (Flare-R) and 7,000 synthetic flares (Flare7K). It addresses the challenges of removing complicated degradation caused by lens flares in nighttime photography.
dcterms:title: Flare7K++

dcterms:creator: Y. Dai
C. Li
S. Zhou
R. Feng
C. C. Loy
dcterms:description: Flare-R is a dataset containing 962 real-captured flare images taken with various smartphone cameras, designed to enrich the diversity of flare patterns for nighttime flare removal.
dcterms:title: Flare-R

dcterms:creator: Y. Dai
C. Li
S. Zhou
R. Feng
C. C. Loy
dcterms:description: Flare7K is a synthetic flare dataset consisting of 7,000 flare images, including 5,000 scattering and 2,000 reflective flare images, designed to simulate various flare patterns for training deep learning models.
dcterms:title: Flare7K

dcterms:creator: C. Sakaridis
D. Dai
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: Dark Zurich is a dataset designed for semantic nighttime image segmentation, providing a benchmark for evaluating nighttime vision algorithms.
dcterms:title: Dark Zurich

dcterms:creator: L. Neumann
M. Karg
S. Zhang
C. Scharfenberger
E. Piegert
S. Mistr

R. Thiel
A. Vedaldi

B. Schiele
dcterms:description: NightOwls is a dataset focused on pedestrians at night, providing images for training and evaluating nighttime vision algorithms.
dcterms:title: NightOwls

dcterms:creator: X. Zhang
R. Ng
Q. Chen
dcterms:description: Flickr is a dataset used for single image reflection separation, providing images for training and evaluating image restoration algorithms.
dcterms:title: Flickr

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Uratsun
dcterms:description: Kitti is a dataset that combines vision and robotics, providing images for various tasks in autonomous driving and computer vision.
dcterms:title: Kitti
